title: Microsoft software outage: Bank services across the world take a hit
description: Microsoft software outage: Microsoft users worldwide, including banks, experienced widespread outages on Friday following the company's acknowledgment of ongoing fixes for issues affecting Microsoft 365 apps and services. In Australia, disruptions were particularly severe in the banking sector, with institutions like Commonwealth Bank reporting customers unable to transfer money. National Australia Bank (NAB) and Bendigo were also affected.
